caption: Food so good, it will make you swallow your tongue.  I love investing my money in my community.  Professional staff & great location.
New place, great food, parking is limited.
Great food,atmosphere and service
Nice but super expensive
Good food and open late
Great food 😋🔥💯
The FOOD WAS AMAZING! Best boil spot I have ever went to! Also it’s BLACK OWNED! 🤞🏾🤞🏾🤞🏾
Very polite staff. Thanks for the recommendations Mercedes 😊

Delicious food. Amazing atmosphere. Good pricing. The owner Chad was out bussing tables and definitely does not make his staff do all of the work. He took care of my table for sure. He was super nice and came across as a genuine human being. Anytime I go to Atlanta I will definitely be visiting this establishment.
Really didnt enjoy my seafood boil the only tasty part was my corn. And my shrimp was crunchy and not cleaned very well. And my drink was strong as hell.

I would to like let everyone kno this place made me soo happy to find it was the whole vibe for me.on a Monday I had a blast  my friends from outta twn loved everything definitely they bartender it’s nothing like a place with great food and perfect hospitality I mean I loved everything about it ❤️❤️ From the valet parking dwn to the music the boiler definitely worth every penny spent and I forgot to add they was the first place in Atl Whr the king crab taste like something soo I definitely love them for that ✅

Was visiting from Los Angeles and had to try a boiling bag place. Found this place. You place your name on the wait-list to be texted and wait over an hour. That gave us time to park across the street. When we finally returned to the restaurant we went inside and I had to remind staff that I been waiting over an hour. She was nice and told my party to follow her. The place is packed. After eating all the good food the check arrives. It was only three of us. They would not separate the check. Our check was over $200. Party of six or more and check over $200 you will pay 18% gratuity. Didn't like that part. Didn't make a fuss. Other than that. I had a good time with my friends. We ate good. Drinks were on point. Had a good experience.
I've had crab boils in about 4 different states and the seasoning here is number 1. Very tasty without being salty or bland. It was just right.

The restroom was nasty!! Men and women share the restroom how disgusting!! We sat down (just two of us) and it took a hour for us to get our food! We asked three servers who’s table were we at and no one could answer us. Multiple tables asked for the manager. This place is so slow it’s ridiculous and I will not be back!! By the way the calamari was salty!!
Great I love grab legs
Great service fast seating right before closing

So I  am on my honeymoon went here because we heard food was good. We realized we never got an actual bill so I called to see if they could email it to me because it seemed off. So I just wanted to make sure. Manager would never come to the phone and they left me  on hold never getting back to me so that makes me feel they may do this alot of overcharging. We would of come back but after this definitely not don't pay cash and get a bill before you pay. We would of been future customers since we live in Georgia and would of brought more business for you guys since I'm a manager myself but the unprofessional leaving people on hold and then not answering when they try and call back is ridiculous your busy but not that busy when a customer has a concern you answer.
Customer service was great!
Mercedes was AMAZINGGGGG!!!!!!! So friendly! She went above and beyond for my table!!!!
Great food and drinks...the price was affordable...
Customer service was terrible. Food was decent. But even Management was dismissive of issues. I wouldn’t recommend it.

Woo this for starters is not a restaurant for families, the music (and I’m no prude) was sooooooo raunchy, I mean lord it was just too much. I just don’t need to hear about some things while trying to eat. It was loud, ratchet, chicks were standing on chairs and tables dancing, just a mess. Had I been mentally prepared I may have been ok but I wasn’t ready and had my kids because I thought it was an actual restaurant lol. Food was mediocre, had a reservation and still waited over an hour, some things on the menu were real tasty, and some were awful. Mozzarella sticks were frozen in the middle but the whole fried fish was tasty. This fried lobster tail picture was way better than it actually tasted. For all the antics there’s way better food around Atl without all the nonsense and inconsistencies in quality. May be fun for a younger crowd just wanting to be seen but I won’t be back.
Food was amazing. Valet guys were really respectful. Loved the place. First time there for St. Patrick's Day.  5 stars from me!

They were pretty good overall. Could be a little cleaner, but the fried catfish, shrimp and fries meal was tasty. They were also pretty busy on a Wednesday after work and parking sucks. Valet is free, tips encouraged, but good luck with there being so many people on the happy hour days. The bartender was nice, but the hostess n the front, not so much.
Too much minced garlic. Food wasnt all that. Sauce really oily
Greatness in a bag and the young lady was very helpful ✨✨✨ Food was nice and spicy
Seafood egg rolls are top tier. The blueberry Margaritas are delicious. Decor is flawless. Our server was amazing.
I caught seafood poisoning from the under cooked lobster tail that order

HORRIBLE HORRIBLE SERVICE! Tried to order 2 nights in a row and wasn’t able to. Then I was placed on hold aka hung up on while trying to resolve the issue. Won’t recommend them anymore. GO SOMEWHERE ELSE. They only care about celebs.

Went  for a Birthday get together on Saturday. While waiting we sat at the bar and Myles made an amazing drink -Dusse Margarita. I tried the seafood egg rolls which were better than I imagined. I had a seafood boil with shrimp and snow crab leg which was good as well. The sauce was saltier and thicker than I like but still good. My guy had the blue crabs which I also tried and were good.

The food was good. But they are very unorganized and the host (lady at the podium at the front door) is very over worked. She answers the phone, get to go orders and sit people. I had a reservation and still had to wait to be seated for over 45 mins.

Horrible service. Food is okay nothing to really brag about. Ordered drinks that took 40 mins to come. Food order took over an hour and the restaurant was not busy at the time. Waitress had terrible service. Don’t even bother coming here
Our waiter was Jay. VERY attentive & great customer service. The food & drinks were good. I made reservations came in didn't have to wait. The atmosphere is good. Nice chill spot to try.
Delicious food 😋, dragon fruit martini was delicious. Tight space for the crowd

The food is Ok....the only thing I didnt like is the fact they hyped it up to be better than Juicy Crab. If they would've just promoted it as a new seafood spot my expectations would not be so high.  The drinks and desserts are very pricey.   The only thing I am happy about is its a black owned business.

This place is clearly overrated and overpriced. $4 for a Coke?! Our server Brittany was great. Her service was great. The atmosphere was very, very crowded during a pandemic. No masks worn. Food was terrible. We had the catfish basket with sweet potato fries and the combo that come with crawfish, shrimp, snow crab, and black mussels. Fish extra salty and greasy. Charged extra for the sweet potato fries (they had powdered sugar on them and wasn’t notified they costed extra). Seafood combo was over cooked. Crawfish tasted like they were boiled in saltwater, shrimp were extra chewy, crab legs were the best tasting thing in the combo (Kroger steamed has this beat!). Will not return.

I was very excited to try this new popping restaurant in Buckhead called the boiler but there were many issues upon my visit. strike number one we ordered mango margaritas and they were absolutely disgusting, it was completely thick syrup. The boil was also salty hell. Also the waitress offered us water and never brought it. Neither our waitress or the manager cared that the food did not meet our expectations. I highly suggest you do not come here.
The food is incredible. Brittany is an outstanding server  and we will definitely be back.

I WENT DURING ALL STAR WEEKEND BIG MISTAKE BUT ONCE I GOT SEATED SHOUT OUT MILEA AT THE DOOR AND ERICA WHO TOOK CARE OF US EVEN THO IT WASNT HER SECTION SHE STILL TOOK CARE US  FOOD AND DRINKS WAS HITTIN THO ILL BE BACK JUST EVER PARK ON THE PEP BOYS AUTO LOT THEY WILL PUT A BOOT ON YOUR CAR FOR $75
$$$ messed up 2 food orders

They forgot eggs and potatoes in bag and brought out these cold eggs and potatoes. Corn super overcooked. My bf food was wrong and never was fixed. They are a rip off. Please never visit. Not worth the costs. Better places to eat. Very ghetto and ratchet establishment. And parking is horrible. Don’t waste your time.
Dunno if I liked the seafood more or all the  beautiful women 😍

Visited the Boiler this past Sunday. Had a reservation for 5:30 pm and wasn't seated until an hour later. This is after asking the hostess about the wait and her getting smart stating that she didn't know what was taking so long because she was standing up front with me.  There is no organization and everyone that comes in is given the same wait time.  Reserved tables and times should be held for customers who make reservations and not just given to people who freely come in. After being seated we tried to order drinks they didn't have any frozen drinks, as stated by the waiter. She asked did we want appetizers and when we ordered she came back to tell us the fryers weren't working at the time.  The food was great but service is horrible along with parking.  She made us pay on one check to get her 18% gratuity because that made the check over $200. When we told her it was separate checks she stated that her system would not allow her to seperate the paymenrs. Overall good food but horrible service. Will never go again.
The worst seafood bags I’ve ever had!! Spent damn near $200 just to throw my food away!

Rubbery shrimp was filled with dooky king crab little but no tools to help open and service was a mess Allstars weekend made reservations still had 30 minutes staying wait, when finally seated, had to get a manager to get a waiter no service at all

We visited this location to celebrate my daughter’s 21 birthday. Our reservation was at 7:30, but we weren’t seated for over an hour plus(due to VIPs came in this is what we were told).The seafood did have good flavor and awesome size shrimp. However the potatoes were hard and the corn was overcooked. The 5 patron silver flight style drinks were 80, don’t order, flavor just okay. When asked if you want a bottle water say no. It Fiji Water and it’s 5.00 a bottle. The server Krista C did check on us frequently, but came and left very quickly. The restaurant was packed. Parking was horrible due to wait time for valet and the limited amount of space for parking.There are other restaurants that can provide what this restaurant provides if not more. I think people come here to be seen and because celebrity have complimented this location.I guarantee when you are well known and people know you have money they treat you differently. A manager never apologized for our wait and didn’t ask about our food . We had a party of 6 and spent easily over five hundred dollars. If it wasn’t my daughter’s birthday, we would have left.
Food was decent but dinner 4 2 and 2 cocktails was a little pricey

First time patron! No parking in small lot but thank God for valet! Upon entering, I was shocked to see masks not being enforced and people jammed into spaces without any social distancing observed. I really didn't noticed until we were seated.  Our waitress Krista C was awful! She was not friendly, offered fast service to us where we couldn't get a question in quick enough. She debated with another waitress about her tables in front of us. The appetizer came after our entree. The over-seasoned medium sauce requested appeared to be HOT at best. I found no meat in my crab legs as I cracked them. I'd never seen this before. My boil bag was missing the 1/2 lb. of sausage and wasn't given until leaving. Krista C slammed the rolled bag of sausage on our table plain with no seasoning. I left it there purposely! The drinks were not refilled, water wasn't asked or offered, and the bill was $197 for 2 people.  After asking to view the contactless wrist machine, it showed that Krista C automatically included 18% gratuity for 2 people. It wasn't until we left that we discovered that she said we were a party of 6 to justify her entering our tip herself. After asking for our receipt 3 times, I also spoke with a manager who said to me he believes I'm telling the truth because he's received these complaints about her before. However, I could tell he wasn't or have never made any corrective measures since Krista C still does the same while getting fraudulent tip rewards! Because I tip 20% and more, she cheated herself. If asked would I return, I'd say not at this time compared to Pariot's Boil and Juicy Crab with better service at cheaper price for the same food.

Let's start here... food is definitely wonderful. But I did not get what I ordered. I placed a to go order. Asked for a lobster tail just for it not be in the bag (double bagged) asked/paid for extra potato's and egg. Didn't receive. Saw the server behind the bar make my drink and with the same gloves used to wipe his forehead .. and pull down his mask. Very UNSANITARY ESPECIALLY DURING COVID. Great food low prices but never again.

Omg!! I had a great time at the bar!! Tye the bartender was the absolute BEST!!!! 💪🏾 THE DRINKS WAS ON POINT! Food was an 8...  The owner Kool 💯! Parking limited highly suggest you Lyft! Parking is free.. TIP the valet they do good job at watching the lot!

So me and a few friends were here on Saturday night February 27! We arrived around 10:35 PM and we were told the wait was only going to be 30 minutes; we got seated at 12:15AM after going up to the hostess twice! As we get seated and ordering the waitress told us the kitchen was closing soon so everybody order everything they wanted. The waitress already had an attitude but we tried to give her he benefit of the doubt! So everyone got their food BUT ME! I ordered a fried basket! Everyone knows fried food cooks faster than the bold food! Everyone got their boiled but i never got my food! Around 1:10 AM after we had to get someone to track down our waitress b because she never even came to check on the table, we told her o never got the food! When she came back she said “we took it off your ticket” nevertheless i was never given any food, NOTHING! Waitress was too busy talking to the bartender and not tending to her tables then proceeded to have an attitude all night ! I just give it a complete bad review!
Just got some fine women up there that's it 😂😂😂😂😂
Delicious food with great service what more could you ask for.
Just picked someone up from there.  Parking lot is too small and congested.
Good atmosphere/vibe & solid customer service 🤜🏾🤛🏾💯 ..we came all way from Wilmington Delaware 🤘🏾

I love this place !! I had Mercedes as my waiter and she was nothing short of amazing! The food was great ! Miles was also my bartender the first time I went he was great as well !! 10/10 — p.s it’s better than juicy crabs !

TERRIBLE!!!!!! Do not waste your time or money. Waitress was very dry, didn’t show any interest in serving our table.  Didn’t have much knowledge of the menu.  Menu online is not accurate with what we were billed.  We were a party of 3 with separate bills and our receipt  reflected a party of 6 which automatically prompted their system to charge us a 18% gratuity.  This information is not listed on the receipt nor is it on the website.  The website mentions an automatic gratuity for a bill larger than $200; however our bills were split.  We were completely blindsided. This is not a tasteful way to run a business. I don’t recommend this place at all. They are taking advantage of people.  I didn’t even mention the food.  Very salty!!!  I will say the server circled back around and apologized! We appreciated that. Because of that, we gave an additional tip.  However, management should do reevaluating when it comes to their  policies and procedures
The parking was terrible but food was great
Customer service is good but the food is not. Every time I go it’s different. Nothing is consistent but the drinks. I come for the food.
The food was the best ever and the people were great.
Everytime I go I get the same thing, and it taste different every single time :/
This place was awesome! The service was great and the food was delicious. I will definitely be going back!!
Excellent service, great tasting food
The server kept messing our order up. Took 5x to.get it correct
Beautiful establishment. The Dusse Colada was fire and so was the food. The seafood egg rolls are definitely a must-have. Very nice vibe however my server was a 2/10.
The food and drinks are amazing! We had to wait for about an hour and a half but the wait was worth it! And it was a Saturday night. Good music and we had a really good server!
Food was delicious, service was bad. Took forever to come to the table with no menu then told us to scan the barcode. Also came late with drinks.

It was amazing. I  feel they should've told us more about the drinks. I had five different liquors my friend say and didn't know. It was time going out for drinks with a friend it was so lovely like I loved everything about it but the five liquors oh my gosh

****DO NOT GET ERICA AS A WAITRESS****  Went here for the first time expecting to be blown away but was extremely disappointed, not by the food, but by my waitress Erica. I can honestly say, the portions, flavor and pricing were on point! The vibe there is amazing..loved the music and decor. My waitress however, not so much. Not sure if she was new or if she just didn’t care but I had to pretty much ask for things that were suppose to be provided just in basic server etiquette. We weren’t given straws, my friend had to walk to the bar and grab them. After that we ordered an appetizer, she didn’t give us silverware. Erica  suggested we try a specific sauce with our hush puppy appetizer but after bringing the food, she said they were out..ok, not her fault, but would of been nice to know before we placed our order. Or even once she found out they were out of the sauce. My friend asked for hot sauce and a refill on her drink, which took literally 10 mins for the sauce, then another 15 for the refill!!! I mean OMG! Needless to say, I am very understanding IF I can see a full house and tables filled from wall to wall, BUT that wasn’t the case. She had our table of 2 and another table of 2 behind us. We could see her standing by the bar talking to the hostess..just doing nothing. We literally had to ask for refills on our waters EVERY TIME! At one point we had to grab another waiter after waiting on her for 20 more mins, to ask her to come over to us..which in that instance, she admitted she forgot to bring us out what we asked for. Overall, we enjoyed the atmosphere, and the food, but due to the service from the waitress, it really dampened our whole experience.

Had a great experience. Seafood was really good. It was my first time eating blue crab and it was good. The environment is chill and turnt at night. Free valet parking. My bartender was nice and made my drink very good and sweet. Will be back!
Food was good and customer service was great also! Drinks were very tasteful.
Krystal was great waitress
Good food and services
Food was very salty but otherwise the spot was cool...
The wait was longer than expected and when it was time for us to be seated it was a conflict. Minus that the food was delicious, the atmosphere was lit,and I seen Lil Duval:)
Awesome food and atmosphere!
The service was really good right alone with the drinks and food.

Overpriced,My 3 times experience in this place was bad-Im business owner, if i will charge you alot of fk money,I will make sure ,you get the righ server,quality food and good service-This place make everything wrong!Ladys server dont care about the service!!!Need alot communications.i give them a try next year.

Wow! The seafood egg rolls are stuffed with goodness and paired with a spicy yet tangy dipping sauce. The lobster tail was cooked perfectly and I like that the drawn butter has extras in it like herbs and garlic! It's the non mushy corn on the cob for me!! Most of these seafood establishments serve mushy corn but not here! I'll be back soon.
Great place to eat with Great seafood nice professional friendly folks
Best seafood I've had in Atlanta
Dope Vibe! Me and my friends had a nice girls night!
Food was amazing Sauce was amazing The ambiance was okay  and it is a little bit more expensive than the competitors
Food was off the chain.ill be back!
cajun sauce was made to perfection.
The boiler has great food and even better service! Cashmere and Taylor really took care of us, thank you!!💓Will definitely be back
This Is A Great Place, Food And Vibe Is On Point!
Salmon well seasoned but fries can be fresher
Service, food, and atmosphere was wonderful
Great environment. Try the Seafood Egg Rolls  they are Amazing!
The food was delicious and the service was great

My visit at The Boiler was great. Taylor was my server and she was wonderful despite how busy she was juggling other tables. She was very attentive, friendly and now when I go I have a server who I can rely on. Food was great! It’s similar to the Juicy Crab but with a higher price point. Drinks look amazing! I had the cotton candy martini which was delicious. The downside is that they do not have parking, you must valet. Also must make a reservation if you plan on visiting during the weekend to guarantee your spot. Lastly, since we’re in the midst of a pandemic I would have liked to be distance from other tables and guest. I think they should reconsider that rule!  Other than that. Experience was great !!!!

First off how are you a seafood spot but you got pork in almost every dish? Margarita $16 Seafood eggrolls $16 (only 2) Sweetest person was the valet driver. I sat at bar solo with NOBODY at the bar.  Sat for almost 5 mins before bartender actually spoke then he just pointed at the scan code for the menu. Never explained or recommended anything, nor whip down the bar. I did it. I said I was gone leave bc there unwritten menu rules made it to difficult to order & eat with my diet restrictions. He seemed irritated & walked off.  So I left.
Beautiful ambiance...Food was awesome and our waitress Jakael, was exceptionally warm and pleasant. Highly recommended.
Our waitress Jakael was amazing! Very attentive and welcoming! Chilled vibes and the food was great! Will definitely be coming back.
Food was delicious and the service was great!

The food is really good! Calamari was cooked perfectly, the seafood eggrolls are amazing! The seafood is cooked and flavored perfectly nothing was overcooked. The 1 issue I had with the establishment is that fountain drinks have no free refills and are $4 a cup. There was a small mix up of how much eggs corn and potatoes I was suppose to get in my bag but my server and manager Mike fixed the problem promptly. There is valet parking and they do ask for a tip being that is what they work off of. No big deal. Definitely would be a place to visit again if the vibe and consistency of food stays the same.
The place offers a nice range of delicious food. I loved dining here. Staff members are always super friendly, rates are fair and the place is always kept clean.
The special is amazing, boiled to satisfaction, everything else is self satisfying, My children love it thanks.

The food was GREAT.  Our server was Desi. She was good. I love how everyone works together.  I'm not sure if Mike is the owner or manager but he was awesome. He checked on us regularly and he didn't mind stepping in to help his staff. I also love the fact they have valet.

TRASHHHHHHH, EXPENSIVE & Tastelessness. This place lack substance and flavor. They need to go to king crab or Juicy crab and get the receipt;  it’s a fail. Use salt or ole bay. And the only flavors for the crabs hot, mild or medium I thought I was getting wings 🤨

My experience at The Boiler Seafood Atlanta was nothing short of amazing. Great day vibe! I had the Fried chicken and shrimp basket with fries and the Firecracker drink all of which were amazing! Malik was the valet person and did a good job. Tanisa was my server and was very sweet and accommodating. Mike the manager was personable and pleasant making sure I left satisfied. I will definitely be back!
Loveddddddd the fried red snapper and would definitely purchase again!!
The food was fantastic! We had great service and great experience all around. The manager was always great.

Didn’t have a good first experience so many things went wrong from the beginning to the end but I’ll try again to support because it’s black owned. Things that went wrong upon being seated we waited for a server everyone kept walking by the table literally had to flag a server down and ask for help. I suppose we got the worst picking Brittany was the name I believe. My friends food was cold she had to send it back also the sauce was kinda bland. I got the wrong order and then had to wait for it to be corrected. Another friend ordered fried food which came out separately  “waited for fresh fries to come out”. Waited 20 minutes for another round of drinks from the bar seemed like server error because our table was next to the bar and it wasn’t busy. To end it off when we where ready to cash out we got told “everything had to be on one bill with one card payment no separate checks” and gratuity was included(which isn’t a problem pending I had good service) at this point we asked for management which the lady did smooth things out. But definitely let guest know about the one check situation and automatic gratuity.

Here for the first time and loving it. Customer service being shown by Tanisa the bartender doing everything she could to make sure I was good. Then management Chad, Michael, Frank, they love they show is just different from many locations I have ever been to. Also Tea was a wonderful young lady that made sure customer service was shown even if she wasn’t the bartender or the server.
Great food!!!! Great service!!!!
This was my first experience and Myles was amazing!!!! Great food and great service!!!! Will be back! Can't wait to try the Martinis!!!!

I am visiting Atlanta for the weekend and was looking for a great seafood restaurant to eat at. From the valet parking, great customer service to the DELICIOUS seafood....I was impressed🥰. EVERYthing was great!! Our waitress, JAKAEL B. was friendly, professional and made sure we was satisfied! The food and service is worth the money💯

I highly recommend The Boiler. The food was hot fresh and delicious. Oh and the sauce was immaculate! I loved the vibe. The music and staff made this an eventful experience. Anytime I’m visiting ATL, I’ll be sure to stop by THE BOILER!!
The vibes were everything. Great R&B vibes playing and really clean! I’d recommend grabbing a hot combo :)

Had a great Thursday evening at the Boiler. Our bartender Jesus was awesome and friendly. You could see his smile through his mask. He made us feel very comfortable with our decision of Combo Specials. He suggested the seafood egg rolls as a appetizer and he also brought out a lemon aioli That was sooo bomb. Great customer service is so hard to come by nowadays, but Jesus was on point, and I definitely appreciate that. I’m not gonna lie, before I went to The Boiler, I saw a review that made me want to go into another direction. I said to myself no let me go ahead and just try it for myself. And I’m very glad that I did!
First timer...Great environment, friendly people. I love this place and especially during this pandemic social distance was important. This is definitely my only seafood Spot.  I will be returning.
I REALLY LOVE THE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THE FOOD WAS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING....... VERY TASTEFUL..... HIGHLY RECOMMEND I WILL DEFINITELY BE BACK
Great service from start to finish. Food was cooked & seasoned to perfection. I will definitely be back!!

This restaurant  is a highly recommended At the time of arrival Valet personnel had a welcoming and friendly approach. Upon Entry there was a Nice Greeter at the door along with the knowledgeable bartender. The food was outstanding. In the mist of dinning there was a minor hiccup with getting our order out in a timely fashion, but Mike the Manager went over and beyond to accommodate the circumstances, and to say the least we were extremely satisfied, Grateful, and we will return  again soon. Thanks Again Mike!!

So where do I start. Me and my boyfriend came to the restaurant on a double date with my home girl. We had reservations at 6:15. We didn’t receive our drinks until after 7. We didn’t get our good u til 7:30. The waitress Brittany was not friendly at all. Didn’t come back to check on us once our drinks were out. Never cleared the table so it was just trash and plates everywhere. The manager is walking around with his mask pulled down the entire time. 18% gratuity is automatically included which makes sense why the service is poor. But needless to say we won’t be back. I always want to give black businesses a chance but the entire experience was an absolute mess. I hope they read their reviews and properly train their team.

Krista was absolutely PHENOMENAL ! She gave the best food suggestions and her customer service skills were out of this world! The drinks, appetizers & entrees were amazing!! Thank you girl and I will definitely be coming back ASAP.

I barely wanted to rate them ANY star! I drove a whole hour to try them out because i saw allot of celebrities hyping them up so i said imma go, i get there.. i didnt wait that long on my food but once i got it i opened up my bag and only had 1 CRAB LEG IN THE BAD with only 2 claws attached to it and the other 2 were missing! I looked in the bag to see if it fell off and NOTHING also, they mixed my sauces up ! I told the manager he acted like he did not care and chose to do nothing about it! NEVER AGAIN WILL I SUPPORT “black businesses” like this again because they dont have a care in the world and just want your money!

The only good thing from this place was the water and our waiter! The food was horrible it tasted like a spicy tomato sauce on crab legs. Place was packed and no mask were worn. Ordered mild and the food was super spicy. I would never return and make sure my friends don’t go. 2 stars because the waitress was bomb!!!

Nice place waited a little too long to get our drinks and that was not so bad being a Saturday night . Only thing is they have to review their spice level because it is definitely wrong , I ordered Medium hot and was told by our waiter it is HOT! It was not at all I would not even say it was mild. My sister ordered boiling hot !!again it was medium .
Love this place. The food and drinks were great! The energy was high and the staff was wonderful. Can’t wait to go again.

This place hit the spot! The atmosphere, ascetics and customers service was everything I could have asked. I had the pleasure of enjoying a few(more like everything) things on the menu and nothing disappointed. I highly recommend The Boiler Room to anyone who’s in  Atlanta.
This is THE PLACE!-BEST CATFISH EVER! With fried shrimp, cajun calimari, seafood boil spe ial is enought for 2! Soooo yummy!

I had an AMAZING experience at The Boiler, from the time I pulled in. They offered FREE valet service which is ELITE for a Seafood restaurant to even consider so that was the first thing that completely sold me. Walking in I was greeted by the staff all the way until the time my family and I were seated. I am huge on customer service, that is a maker or breaker for me and my family before we even taste food at restaurants. The food was AMAZING from the appetizers ( sea food egg rolls, mozzarella sticks, salmon bites, and a few more) i had the opportunity to try the boil, the Alfredo, and a few other items my family ordered around the table. We can not forget the drinks !!! I can say I am very satisfied with the amount of liquor in the drinks. They are not watered down And poured very well. Others at the table ordered the fire crackers, martini flight and a few other. They we very pleased as well. I will most certainly visit this BLACK OWNED establishment every chance I get ! Thank you for the experience !!!

I came in and sat at the bar for 15 minutes and was not acknowledged AT ALL! There were 3 bartenders WORKING. All looked at me several times and never asked did I even need a water. POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE I will NEVER GO BACK‼️

Sooo i had leave a review because my experience was AMAZING. The entire ambiance of the place is perfect. My service was even better w/ the food being just as a imagined. Just to see everybody having a good time during this pandemic and to see so many happy faces was heart warming! I will be back and will be bringing my family with me. I highly recommend!!!!
The place is beautiful !

Nice atmosphere to hang out and chill with friends but far as the actual service it was ok had way better for a cheaper price waitress was a bit awkward and seem very annoyed when it came to helping us out with bill. Other than that this place is very overhyped.

I was hyped to go just because I seen some celebrity posting pictures🤦🏾‍♀️ Not worth the hype....drinks were overpriced & had NO liquor & food was ok but over priced. $16 for a shrimp & catfish basket, which only had 4 shrimp, a half of catfish & some fries. They charge my sister $4 for a glass of pineapple juice that she asked to be put in her drink. Also a $15 gratuity charge.
Nice appearance 👌
Desert was Fabulous and Good Atmosphere
Good food

The ambience of the place is beautiful, but the crabs are horrible. They have too much seasoning on it until it makes your food inedible.  The snapper was amazing with the sweet chili sauce , but I went for a crab experience and got nothing but dark black seasoning all over my crabs. If you want fried food, then try it, but the crabs are not worth it and on top of that they charged me a 30% gratuity and I had to talk to the manager to get it right. I am an accountant, so I would recommend adding up your check to make sure its correct.

Super happy the community created something good. I waited over a year for this place to open so i was super excited. Service was excellent! Good and drinks so/so.. The drinks were very light almost like no alcohol ( virgin margarita)  was in it and I’m a weakling! One margarita and I can’t walk. The food was okay, I got sick and my husband was in the bathroom .. we figured it was probably the drink that countered the food because it was just pure sugar and margarita mix .. we are pescatarian so we only eat seafood. The service was excellent so we might give it another chance in a few months, I support Our community so I’m willing to give it a try after New Years. But the experience was excellent aside from the dining. Oh and for two special for $33 each and two ducce margaritas each at $16 came up to $241.00 .. we not taking Ruth Chris I’m taking Shaking Crab 👀..

So starting out everything was going pretty good, the host sat me and my wife immediately, our waitress was super sweet and attentive as we waited our arrival of our food. I had the combo #1 and I can’t lie the seafood was actually great. My wife had the seafood egg rolls and the combo special.... food amazing, now the reason for the 4 stars is because of the way the manager Mike approached us. it was a bit uncomfortable as we watched him, what i observed was he seemed to be a bit inebriated or maybe off some kinda drug. he was pacing non stop and was just acting very strange i cant explain it but my wife and i was laughing amongst ourselves about it and the table next to us even noticed, other than that everything was great.

Let’s first start by saying “Black Owned and Amazing”  Entering the establishment we were greeted by the lovely Mila  and it was all smiles over here☺️.( I saw it through the mask - lol) I just love a friendly face especially during these trying times.  Where do I start.  Pro’s  Location :Prime BuckHead lot: Easy to find. ✅  Space: Is perfect- Not to small - Not to big- 6 feet separation. ✅ mask friendly Staff✅  Decor:  Fabulous- Dorian is the truth and life... The builder really took their time to make sure everything was nice. Fashionable Blue sofas and  🌊 Counter Tops!! Wood floors- Nice spot  Parking: Valet- Tip your drivers people🤟🏾  Service: Zoe and Sid are A1. Beautiful personalities! Friendly and knowledgeable. Very Attentive and set the Bar! For this to be the second day open, they didn’t miss a beat!!  Food: Listen say what you want-  Juicy Crab Who. I’m a new fan of this joint! We had the Cajun Alfredo pasta with🦞 tail. ✅ The Boiler Special  with Boiler hot sauce: a must- that sauce is so thick and spicy!!!  The corn I could eat by itself lf! The crab cakes- actually have lots of crab meat in it and were great!  We also had the Calamari - seasoned to perfection!!!!!! All the food was great and seasoned!!  Drinks— LISTENNNNNNNN - My guy Blue - has really out done him self- Along with Myles making the drink .  We had the Candy Martini Flight, The Fireworks (with actual Fire works) and a Mango Mojito Bag. Management: Chad was very friendly and tentative to all his guests making sure everything went smoothly. For this being day 2 you would have thought this location had been open for years the way everything went! Also thanks Kimmie for taking the time out to check on every table! 💯  Only 1 Con  If your bill is over 100.00 its an automatic Gratuity charge. Which I understand when people don’t tip. I personally like to tip off my experience not because you made me tip!!!  Overall: New Hot Spot indeed!!!!

This place is amazing!  The customer service is everything!  Professionalism all the way around from the time I pulled into valet to being seated to my server.  It was a top notch experience.  The drinks were strong and good.  My mother fell in love with the firecracker!  The food was superb!  I had fried lobster and the vegan boil (best vegetables I've ever had).  Those who dined with me had the fried salmon and crab boil.  They were just as pleased.  The vibe is undeniable and the ambiance is great.  I don't live in Atlanta, but please believe every time I visit this will be one of my regular stops!
Outstanding establishment! The food is better than I’ve had anywhere else & the drinks are amazing. Great ambience as well. Best seafood restaurant in Atlanta by far.
Great experience! Amazing place with great customer service. Definitely coming back my family loved this place.

The service was great but my shrimp were way over cooked and my seasoning was dry no water or butter just a dry seafood bag they are fairly new so I will probably give them another chance they definitely have potential .
Service was horrible.  The food was good.
Amazing place great service!!!!
This is a very good establishment. I was looking for somewhere that I can eat my crabs and have a drink on the late night I’m in love

Overall The Boiler is a nice place . The boil is okay. Good Customer service. The seafood egg rolls are really good. Drinks are good and really strong. Only thing I don’t like is already gratuity. I like to be the judge of that. Everyone does not have great/good customer service nor deserve. They also don’t allow separate bills that’s BS.
Mike and mikal made sure me and my friend was taking care of thank you !
I walked in and the service was great from the start! Food was so good and the lobster Mac was the best I ever had. Definitely my new go to spot for seafood!

I was seated immediately, food came out in a timely manner, the boil was plentiful with great flavor, the server was nice, and the set up is neat and clean. Valet parking was complimentary! Only cons are it’s new establishment so everything isn’t perfect, but close to it. I went on a Friday evening too. Will definitely come back for the bar and TV!!
Vist today for the first time. Great customer service, Good food, and Great drinks. Will definitely be coming again. Oh yea and the music was jammmmin😊👍🏾
Zoe is amazing. Personality on point
Upon arrival I was immediately flabbergasted. The customer service awesome!

We came here Sunday night off a whim. It caught my eye driving past Gold Room & I told my family i was just craving some seafood so we went. First off the server was very attentive from when we sat down she guided us around the menu & answered alot of questions before getting us started with our drinks. Me & my sis ordered the Candy Martini Flight and let me tell youuuu. Yess! They were strong & the presentation was perfect. Exactly what i needed. For food we got the fried salmon basket and Built our own boil bags. The salmon was soo good the seasoning was on point & they had remoulade sauce which is the bessst if you know anything about it. The boiled bag was served extra hot i got the snow crab, shrimp, mussels & eggs. Spice level Medium wasnt too spicy it was perfect for me. My boo got Hot & it was good for him imma baby lol so ill stick to Medium. But this place will be seeing me again very soon. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Man we have been waited all year for this place to open & this past weekend we were finally able to get a table to eat & drink. I can tell this is about to be another goto spot in buckhead. If they can keep it consistent they should be ‘a ok’. Will try again !

The Service Was Amazing. My Drinks Was Great. I Ordered The Candy Martini Flight For Me And My Girl And That Was The Best Martini’s I Have Ever Tasted. Got My Food In A Timely Manner. I Have No Complaints. I Would Definitely Go Back !!

They never answer the phone ever so drove 30 minutes after believing google open and closed hours only to arrive to a fully open restaurant but told to come back at 3 because apparently they are not open but google says different don’t waste your gas time or money
Great food & staff!

First visit from out of the state.  I saw a bevy of cars and valet so my instincts said check it out, and I love a good seafood boil. It was pretty crowded from the entry and a lot of ppl don't take the mask concern seriously.  Me and my lady ordered our drink, a Dussë margarita and a frozen Dussë colada. The drinks were amazing!! And our waitress was super sweet.. well, why a 2 star rating? We ordered our meals, simple boils with potatoes, eggs and corn..a couple next to us that had been there when we got there got their meal shortly after we finished our drinks.... the couple finished their meals whilst a new table to the left of us was seated, less than 6 feet, no masks... we waited...we waited some more...and some more.. finally the server came and said our food is about to come out... after a bit more waiting our food finally came out.  Buy this point about 40 minutes passed and I saw ppl who came in after us get seated and had their food before us.  Long story short we told the server to put it in a to go bag dueb to the  discomfort of ppl with no regard to a mask policy that's clearly listed upon entering the facility and for waiting 40 min to pay 150 bucks for to go seafood.... great server..other than that........

I went to this restaurant on a busy Saturday night and I was seated immediately. From the hostess to our waitstaff to the decor everything was amazing upon entry. The food was sooo good! And the drinks my goodness top tier! I will be returning! Bonus points for being black owned in a prime Buckhead location.  I got the Cajun Alfredo Pasta with a lobster tail. Also had crab cakes and calamari. My friend got the Boiler Special and that sauce...OMG! Juicy crab has nothing on that food. We got the Martini Flight, Fireworks and Mojito to drink and wow!!! Great presentation even better taste! I was thoroughly impressed and will be returning to try the rest of the menu and drinks.
Unorganized! The website say they close at 5pm but when I get there at 250 a rude gentleman say, we are closed.I’m not wasting my gas going back.

I'm not sure where these reviews are coming from. This place has never been open, even before COVID. I've stopped by and called many times. I'd love to have such a place in the neighborhood, but there has been no grand opening as of yet.
The food and service were beyond my expectations. We truly liked the environment of this restaurant. Nice restaurant to take my family out for dinner.
I could never visit an establishment under Chad Dillon. He’s unmannerly and he doesn’t even pay his contractors for their work or product, that he has received.
I certainly loved their dishes and customer service, great location nearby to my residence. The employees are always super friendly. Will come visit again.
